name: The Medieval Sewer Cleaner
description:
PLEASE READ!! 

Instructions: 

Arrow Keys to move

Space to Jump (Rapidly tap Space for Wall Jump)

Press X to swing your sword 

-----------------

In the future, a scientist formulated a brilliant idea to rid of the Earth’s pollution. “Rather than find space for Earth’s pollution, why not find a time?” 

The Medieval Sewer Cleaner is set in the nearby sewer of a decrepit village whose sewers have been pumped full of pollution that was sent back in time. Galloris, a wandering adventurer-turned-sewer-cleaner, accepts a quest to clean out the sewers of garbage and pollution in hopes of reviving the village. 

Galloris will travel through the sewers of the village while jumping on various platforms and clearing out the trash to avoid the toxins of the poisonous sludge down below. 

Created By: Ashanti Anthony

-----------------

Credits:

"8-Bit Cave Loop" by Wolfgang
"Foggy Woods" by Allan Oliveira

Art Assets-

"Pixel Dark Forest" & "Pixel Lost Game Scene" by Szadi Art
"Medieval Warrior Pack" by Luiz Melo
"2D Dungeon Pixel Art Tileset" by Zhivko Minchev

Base Code by Michael Baker
